pullrequest.title: Do not export urdf symbols in sdformat 1.4 (-> sdf_1.4)

content.raw:
I am now out of town for a few days but will try it soon. Thank you for the effort.

Just a naive question, though, if we just need to prevent dynamic linking of these symbols, why don't we just use a different namespace?
content.html:
I am now out of town for a few days but will try it soon. Thank you for the effort.

Just a naive question, though, if we just need to prevent dynamic linking of these symbols, why don't we just use a different namespace?
